extendedInfo.description: Show that special someone you really care by carving their name next to yours on a tree on your home screen! Set you and your partner's name in the settings screen to have it show up on the tree.Leaves gently fall from the top of the tree. Colors and number of leaves can be set in the settings screen.Supports all screen sizes (Xoom, Galaxy Tab, Transformer and more.)A great live wallpaper for the hopelessly in love (or maybe you just need to give someone a hint!)Art by Anne Paetzke.

reviews.title: Love your wallpapers!
reviews.comment: Fantastic wallpapers! Hope to see more soon!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Alright
reviews.comment: It\'s alright but wish you didn\'t have to write a name at all so there is just the backgroundimage. Would also be nice if the names were in a more woody colour so they actually look carved.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome & Romantic
reviews.comment: I LOVE all of your live wallpapers!! Great quality!!!

reviews.title: Absolutely love it!!
reviews.comment: \"Old School\"  brings back memories! :) 1 suggestion for an update in tree \"oxox or 4-ever\" is  definitely \"Old School\" otherwise a job well done *

reviews.comment: I\'ve paid for the product, but am yet to be able to actually download the product. The free version won\'t even upgrade itself. Is this issue fixable?

reviews.title: Can\'t have only one name...
reviews.comment: Must have two names & the + is not removable... Disappointing.. :(

reviews.comment: Beautiful app but would be better if text had an \'etched in\' effect on wood rather than plain black, and more varied colour schemes-theyre a bit samey

reviews.title: Only if.. .
reviews.comment: Love this live wallpaper, so does my husband. Only if, this app would turn daylight and dark on our own time zone, that would be an A +

reviews.title: Need more options for the $.
